data.message: How to make this video please give me that link

replies.message: Hey there. To go Live on Facebook, just tap the Live icon on your home screen or tap into 'What's on your mind?' and then tap 'Live Video'. You can write a quick description and choose the audience that you want to share with before you go Live. To learn more, visit http://bit.ly/2gVhew7. -Hannah
I want to make 360 videos and please give me link how to make that.
Hey there. You can learn more about how to upload a 360 video here: http://bit.ly/2gcHyna. -Hannah
Why can't make verify my account? Please tell me if you know or make verify to my account . Thank you.

Hey there. We’re currently only accepting verification requests from Pages that represent celebrities, public figures, sports teams, media and entertainment. Please keep in mind that most Pages and profiles, including local businesses, aren't eligible for verification at this time. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2h7LnHX. -Hannah
Thank you very much ........ to facebook.
